releaseNotes:
We’ve added new content inside each emotion and improved app performance.
Enjoy! - Aura Team
description:
** As loved by Apple (Best of 2017, #1 New Apps We Love), TechCrunch, Forbes, TeenVogue, and more!

Aura: Reduce stress & anxiety, improve focus, and sleep better using daily mindfulness meditations, life coaching, stories, and music. All personalized to you based on your mood. 

Do you wish to control your stress and anxiety better? Are you seeking more positivity? Have you tried other mindfulness meditation apps but couldn't form a habit around them? It’s time to try Aura, the simplest solution to reducing stress and increasing positivity through 3-minute meditations.

Aura is the best, AI-driven app for anyone interested in reducing stress & anxiety. Aura provides short and sweet, personalized mindfulness meditations, life coaching, stories, and music whenever you need to make you happier. Listen to guided meditations depending on how you feel, or enjoy sounds of nature.

Start your journey to control your stress and anxiety with Aura. 

AURA FREE FEATURES: 

Meditations to Relieve Stress & Anxiety
• Relieve stress & anxiety with a free daily 3-minute guided meditation session
• Personalized meditations – Choose how you're feeling and receive the best meditation for you
• Listen to specific meditations to put you in the right headspace
• Save meditations to listen again at a later time
• Not sure how you feel? Listen to unguided meditations with the sounds of nature

Improve Your Mindfulness
• Improve your mindfulness by rating your experience
• Aura will learn about your stress and anxiety levels and provide a better mediation session every time

Track Your Mood
• Track your mood and learn about your mood patterns
• Receive insight to how you’re feeling and visually see yourself improve
• Aura is integrated with Apple Health so you can track your mood, meditation, and more

Reminders & Notifications
• Mindful breather + reminders – Take a mindful break whenever you need
• Receive daily reminders for mindful breathers to keep calm during the day

Aura Community
• Connect with Aura’s teachers and other Aura members to share experiences, support and more
• Learn where others are in their journey to relieving stress and anxiety

Gratitude Reflections
• Express gratitude as a habit through daily reflections
• Share what you are grateful for with others in the Aura community

AURA PREMIUM FEATURES: 
• Meditations 24/7, whenever you need
• Choose 3- or 7- or >10- minute meditation durations depending on your availability and comfort
• Save unlimited meditations and listen whenever you want
• Download meditations for offline use

Start your day with energy and purpose, and decrease stress while increasing positivity.

Download the best meditation app now to start relieving stress and anxiety.

“Aura creates positivity throughout the day through simple morning mindfulness... I absolutely can't go a day without it.”

-Stephanie L., LinkedIn

Premium - Monthly subscription: $11.99 / month
Premium - Yearly subscription: $4.99 / month billed every 12 months at $59.99
Premium - Lifetime: $399, one-time charge

Your payment will be handled by Apple. 
iTunes payment information:
Payment will be charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when a subscription is purchased.

Visit Aura: www.aurahealth.io
Privacy Policy: http://aurahealth.io/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: http://aurahealth.io/terms-of-service/
